SEARCH
Package co.kr.bluebird.sled

Interface IBarcodeController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractReader, BTReader, Reader
public interface IBarcodeController
Interface definition for BarcodeController(Uses only in models that attached a barcode H/W on Bluebird android device.)

      Parameters:
      resumeListener - The listener of result.

      int BC_SetBarcodeKeyFormat(int format)
      Sets the format of barcode hardware key
      Parameters:
      format - 0 : PTT/SCAN, 1 : SCAN/PTT, 2 : PTT/PTT, 3 : SCAN/SCAN
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • BC_GetSupportedDevicesInfo

      int BC_GetSupportedDevicesInfo()
      Check whether the device supports barcode/camera
      Returns:

      Not support Barcode/Camera: 0
      Support only Camera: 1
      Support only Barcode: 2
      Support Camera and Barcode: 3
